group.label: Express Checkout
group.comment: Add PayPal as an additional payment method to your checkout page.

field.label: Email Associated with PayPal Merchant Account (Optional)
field.comment: Start accepting payments via PayPal!
field.tooltip: Don't have a PayPal account? Simply enter your email address.

field.label: Buyer Country
field.tooltip: The buyer country determines which funding sources are eligible for a given buyer during testing.

field.label: Proxy Port
field.comment: Please enter at least 0 and at most 65535

field.label: Enable In-Context Checkout Experience
field.comment: See PayPal Feature Support details and list of supported regions here.

field.label: Merchant Account ID
field.tooltip: You can look up your merchant ID by logging into https://www.paypal.com/. Click the profile icon on the top right side of the page and then select Profile and settings in the Business Profile menu. (If you do not see the profile icon at the top of the page, click Profile, which appears in the top menu when the My Account tab is selected.) Click My business info on the left, and the Merchant account ID is displayed in the list of profile items on the right.

field.label: Enable PayPal Credit
field.comment: PayPal Express Checkout lets you give customers access to financing through PayPal Credit® - at no additional cost to you. You get paid up front, even though customers have more time to pay. A pre-integrated payment button lets customers pay quickly with PayPal Credit®. Learn More

group.label: Advertise PayPal Credit
group.comment:

field.label: Publisher ID
field.comment: Required to display a banner

field.label: Title
field.comment: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.

field.label: Authorization Honor Period (days)
field.comment: Specifies what the Authorization Honor Period is on the merchant’s PayPal account. It must mirror the setting in PayPal.

field.label: Order Valid Period (days)
field.comment: Specifies what the Order Valid Period is on the merchant’s PayPal account. It must mirror the setting in PayPal.

field.label: Number of Child Authorizations
field.comment: The default number of child authorizations in your PayPal account is 1. To do multiple authorizations please contact PayPal to request an increase.

field.label: Display on Shopping Cart
field.comment: Also affects mini-shopping cart.

field.label: Transfer Shipping Options
field.tooltip: If this option is enabled, customer can change shipping address and shipping method on PayPal website. In live mode works via HTTPS protocol only.
field.comment: Notice that PayPal can handle up to 10 shipping options. That is why Magento will transfer only first 10 cheapest shipping options if there are more than 10 available.

field.label: Enable PayPal Guest Checkout
field.comment: Ability for buyer to purchase without PayPal account.

field.label: Require Customer's Billing Address
field.comment: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.

field.label: Billing Agreement Signup
field.comment: Whether to create a billing agreement, if there are no active billing agreements available.
field.tooltip: Merchants need to apply to PayPal for enabling billing agreements feature. Do not enable this option until PayPal confirms that billing agreements are enabled for your merchant account.

field.label: Enabled
field.comment: Will appear as a payment option only for customers who have at least one active billing agreement.

field.label: Custom Endpoint Hostname or IP-Address
field.comment: By default it is "reports.paypal.com".
field.tooltip: Use colon to specify port. For example: "test.example.com:5224".

field.label: Custom Path
field.comment: By default it is "/ppreports/outgoing".

field.label: Schedule
field.comment: PayPal retains reports for 45 days.

field.label: PayPal Product Logo
field.comment: Displays on catalog pages and homepage.

field.label: Page Style
field.tooltip: Allowable values: "paypal", "primary" (default), your_custom_value (a custom payment page style from your merchant account profile).

field.label: Header Image URL
field.tooltip: The image at the top left of the checkout page. Max size is 750x90-pixel. https is highly encouraged.

field.label: Header Background Color
field.tooltip: The background color for the header of the checkout page. Case-insensitive six-character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.

field.label: Page Background Color
field.tooltip: The background color for the checkout page around the header and payment form.

field.label: Label
field.comment: The installment feature is available only in these locales: en_MX, es_MX, en_BR, pt_BR.

field.label: Disable Funding Options
field.comment: PayPal will automatically display each enabled funding option to eligible buyers. For example, PayPal Credit is only shown to buyers in countries where PayPal Credit is offered and the currency offered by the merchant is USD.
